law.catch_line: Sanctions against licensee or applicant after opportunity for administrative hearing -- Causes for disciplinary action -- Private admonishment not subject to disclosure.

text.section: A private admonishment shall not be subject to disclosure to the public under KRS 61.878(1)(l). A private admonishment shall not constitute disciplinary action but may be used by the board for statistical purposes or in subsequent disciplinary action against the same licensee or applicant.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 11, effective July 15, 2010.
